name: qzeq goes to the store and fucking shoots it
name_original: qzeq goes to the store and fucking shoots it
description:
6 time game of the year award winner with high action rpg movement with smooth experience with large audience and large community with tons of mods adn cool stuff.

Half-Life 2 is a 2004 first-person shooter game developed by Valve. It was published by Valve through its distribution service Steam. Like the original Half-Life, Half-Life 2 combines shooting, puzzles, and storytelling, and adds features such as vehicles and physics-based gameplay.

Mission:

kill all and go to the store
